Title: Relates to requiring a digital equity officer be appointed by the director of the office of information technology services
Summary: Relates to requiring a digital equity officer be appointed by the director of the office of information technology services to develop, oversee and assist in providing statewide broadband access.
LawCode: Amd ยง102, St Tech L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state technology law, in relation to requiring a digital equity officer be appointed by the director of the office of information technology services
